author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Castellum To Build New Headquarters For E.ON
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - CASTELLUM AB:
* CASTELLUM TO BUILD NEW HEADQUARTERS FOR E.ON - INVESTS APPROX. 1.1 BILLION IN MALMÖ
* ‍PLANNED NEW CONSTRUCTION IN NYHAMNEN COMPRISES APPROX. 24,500 SQ.M. OF LEASABLE AREA.​
* ‍ACTUAL CONSTRUCTION SCHEDULE IS CALCULATED FOR 24 MONTHS​
* ‍NEW BUILDING IS SLATED FOR COMPLETION IN 2021​ * ‍FULLY LEASED, THIS INVESTMENT IS CALCULATED TO GENERATE YEARLY REVENUES OF SEKM 68.5.​
* ‍CASTELLUM INTENDS TO FUND INVESTMENT WITH OWN EARNED FUNDS AND UNUTILIZED CREDITS.​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
